titleInfo.title: Charles Faulkner Bryan home videos "Betty Lynn Centennial Park"

mods.abstract: Edith and Betty (two years old approximately) by water at Parthenon in Nashville, Tenn. and Centennial Park, outside of family home in Cookeville, Tenn. (1:24), outside with horses by dirt road/trail near truss bridge at unknown location (3:31), small children walking together (5:07), family getting in car (5:12), family arriving at a home (5:27), children and small children walking (5:35), climbing dam at Standing Stone State Park (11:19), mill with water as seen in home video RG42_SR_0177 (12:47), dredging (unconfirmed) (13:01), picnic (13:06), unknown karst features and overlook (13:32), unknown stone building and overlook (14:00).

titleInfo.title: RG 42 Charles Faulkner Bryan papers, reel film.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Tennessee Technological University. Archives and Special Collections
